Interface CoreWeatherServiceSpec

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface CoreWeatherServiceSpec

Interface for weather forecast service

Author:
thibaud

Nested Class Summary
static class CoreWeatherServiceSpec.Unit
          Units defined for Weather Conditions EU for European (temperature °C, distance km, pressure mb, speed km/h) - Metric format US for English (temperature °F, distance mi, pressure in, speed mph)

Method Detail

getLocations

java.lang.String[] getLocations()
Returns:
The currently defined locations for Weather Forecast as they were entered

addLocation

void addLocation(java.lang.String placeName)
                 throws WeatherForecastException
Try add the place with an human friendly name to fetch Weather conditions

Parameters:
placeName - A human place name : a town, a country, a particular place or point of interest (poi)
Throws:
WeatherForecastException - If place name in incorrect, misspelled, cannot be found or if weather cannot be retrieved for this place

removeLocation

boolean removeLocation(java.lang.String placeName)
                       throws WeatherForecastException
Try to remove a place previously added

Parameters:
the - placeName as it was previously added
Returns:
true if the place was found and was successfully removed
Throws:
WeatherForecastException - If place name in incorrect, misspelled, or cannot be found

containLocation

boolean containLocation(java.lang.String placeName)
                        throws WeatherForecastException
Check if a location is monitored

Parameters:
placeName - A human place name : a town, a country, a particular place or point of interest (poi)
Returns:
true if the place is currently monitored, false otherwise
Throws:
WeatherForecastException - If place name in incorrect, misspelled, or cannot be found (as a valid location)

setUnit

void setUnit(CoreWeatherServiceSpec.Unit unit)
Parameters:
unit - US or EU

getForecast

java.util.List<DayForecast> getForecast(java.lang.String placeName)
                                        throws WeatherForecastException
Parameters:
the - placeName as it was previously added
Returns:
The Forecast for the next days (number of days might vary), including min and max temperature weather code, for a particular location
Throws:
WeatherForecastException - if no weather forecast have been fetch or if place cannot be found

getCurrentWeather

CurrentWeather getCurrentWeather(java.lang.String placeName)
                                 throws WeatherForecastException
Parameters:
the - placeName as it was previously added
Returns:
The current weather conditions for a particular location , for a particular location
Throws:
WeatherForecastException - if no weather forecast have been fetch or if place cannot be found

getPublicationDate

java.util.Calendar getPublicationDate(java.lang.String placeName)
                                      throws WeatherForecastException
Parameters:
the - placeName as it was previously added
Returns:
The Date at which weather forecast data were initially published (do not confuse with getLastFetch date) , for a particular location
Throws:
WeatherForecastException - if no weather forecast have been fetch or if place cannot be found

getLastFetchDate

java.util.Calendar getLastFetchDate()
Returns:
The Date at which the Weather web-service was requested for the last time or null if no data been fetched

fetch

void fetch()
           throws WeatherForecastException
Try to connect to a weather web-service and fetch the latest weather forecast for all location monitored

Throws:
WeatherForecastException - if impossible to retrieve weather forecast (web-service unavailable, ...)

fireWeatherUpdateMessage

                                         java.lang.String value,

The corresponding notification message
